attributes.action: lord freud - his remarks about disabled workers and the minimum wage
attributes.additional_details:
Lord Freud has stated that 'some disabled workers are not worth' the minimum wage, as reported in the media and has issued a full apology.

It is essential we, as a public, and parents, of disabled people ask David Cameron to set up an enquiry, ultimately to remove this bigot...there is no place in todays society for this type of attitude and opinion.
